thread.title: Zayn's Acoustic Version of "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" Might Be Better Than the Original
thread.title_full: Zayn's Acoustic Version of "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" Might Be Better Than the Original

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Zayn's Acoustic Version of "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" Might Be Better Than the Original
text:
Zayn Malik's "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" Acoustic Version Zayn's Acoustic Version of "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" Might Be Better Than the Original February 3, 2017 by Maggie Pehanick 98 Shares 
If you love "I Don't Wanna Live Forever," but you think it would be better slowed down and without Taylor Swift , then great news! Zayn Malik has released an acoustic version of the track, which was created for Fifty Shades Darker . He teased the video via Twitter on Thursday , telling his fans, "Hey, here's a lil something." Indeed, Zayn. Coincidentally, Taylor Swift also uploaded a video of herself practicing the song for her gig performing at the Super Bowl pre-show. Which one is better? You decide. Related:
